attributes.action: reverse the decision of the BBC Director General to close the BBC Asian Network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe this to be a political decision, to appease Rupert Murdoch. The Asian Network provides a vital voice for people of Asian descent in this country and closing it is not neccessary.

Both the Asian Network and 6 Music are tangible assets with a loyal following. They should not be sacrificed for something purely subjective, ie 'better quality programmes,' as 'better' is likely to mean 'cheaper.'

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
